content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting down getting ready to watch the fireworks display in bangor maine.  probrably 15 or 20 min before they began, we saw a red object in the sky.  i had my video camera and was able to take 19 seconds of footage with both distance and zoom footage.  it was red and pulsating with concentric circles going from the center to the edges.  it was silent and floated in the air.  it was noticable for probrably 5 to 10 seconds before i got my video camera ready to film.  at the end of the footage as i pan out there is a second object over the first object that i did not notice at first.  they just seem to disapear, as if they take off at very high speed going directly away from our vantage point.  i noticed the object because i thought it was the first firework.  but it just continued hovering and did not burn out.  it was visible for 25 to 30 seconds total.  it stayed quite still throuout the sighting, not moving, just pulsating.  i cannot explain what we saw.  i will attach the video clip as soon as i get it downloaded to my computer.  as i write this, i am only about 2 hours removed from the sighting.
content.summary: Red diamond shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in a car park in the town center with a friend when my friend noticed something high up in the sky and pointed it out to me.

the sky was very clear with only a small amount of whispy thin clouds dotted about the sky , visability was excellent , my friend pointed to a very bright shinning object that was stationary and making no sound at all, i cant be exact of the height of the object but it was approximatly at a 60 degrees angle from the ground and we were facing roughly north to north east .
at first it looked like a very bright star but having never seen a star during full daylight and to be honest i dont know if it is possible to see a star in daylight, i dissmissed the star idea , my friend sugested it may be a satalight in very low orbit but we had been observing it for over 3 minutes and it had not moved , then a small thin cloud moved towards it then passed behind it , the cloud was definatly at a higher altitude than the object so then i relised it was no satalight and was definatly now not a star , because the sun was shining so brightly even though it was behind me it was still hurting my eyes staring up at this object so i went into my car to grab my sunglasses , i then remberd i had a pair of small binoclears in my glove box, i grabbed them and went back to my friend who was still watching the object , id say over 5 minutes had passed and the object still had bnot moved .

quickly i focused in the binos on the object and was totally amased at what i saw , i had the focus perfect and could see it very very clearly , the object was an absolutly perfect sphere , white in colour with no markings what so ever , i could clearly see the sun reflecting on the upper left side of the sphere and it was slowly rotating in a clockwise direction , i watched for a moinute or so then passed the binoclears to my friend who watched the object for a short time then handed them back to me , as i watched again in amasment at this strange object it just suddenly vanished before my eyes , one second it was there next it was gone , no movement left ,right or up or down just totally stationary in one spot although it was rotating , then just vanished , this whole thing lasted about 15 minutes but it could have been there much longer before my friend noticed it .

after it was gone i observed 4 passenger jet aircraft pass over the same part of the sky at the same 60 degrees angle , i looked at the air craft through the binoclears so to get some reference as to the size of the sphere , as the passenger jets were flying at aproximatly  the same altitude  as the sphere , i estimate the sphere to be at least 40 feet in diameter or more , roughly speaking 40 to 60 feet in diameter , i have seen weather balloons and this was not one of them , through the binoclears my view was excellent, the fact that it simply just vanished was the most impresive thing for me.

this sphere was very mutch within range of newcastle airport and i feel sure they must have saw it on there radar.
content.summary: Briliant white sphere

content.detailedDescription:
on july 3, 2007 my daughter and i decided to go out to a field  near our house to look at the stars. we took some cushions from lawn chairs and lay down on them. at first we saw a few "shooting stars", airplanes, the usual things. 
suddenly i noticed an object in the sky to the north of us. it had multiple lights on it but they were "chasing" lights, not blinking ones like airplanes have. 
this object was flying much faster than the planes we had seen earlier. it was a disc shape and was at an angle. you could tell that it was spinning and the lights were going around it.  
it probably was only there for about 30 seconds then was gone. the planes that usually fly over you can follow with your eyes for much longer than that. 
i feel that it was not an airplane, and it certainly was not a helicopter. it made no sound whatsoever. (a jet had flown over a few minutes before it did and you could hear the sound of it very clearly) there was no traffic noise or any other noise that would have drowned it out. 
i am curious to know if anyone else in this area happened to see something around that time?
content.summary: Ufo seen over small town in southern illinois

content.detailedDescription:
16th june 2007 at 8.32pm i witnessed a 
strange object in the sky. 
this is my story... 

i live in quinton which is approx 4 miles 
from birmingham city centre. i have had 
an interest in military aircraft since the 
age of 14, i'm now 32. i know the signature 
patterns of aircraft and helicopter strobes 
 and flight dynamics so the identification 
of an aircraft i can make instantly. 
i have been an amateur astronomer for 
over 10 years and own my own 10" 
newtonian telescope with observatory 
so even the faintest satelite or space 
anomaly i can identify. to put it short, 
my eyes are quite well trained and not 
as easily fooled as the untrained eye. 
i have had a keen interest for most of 
my life with ufology and have read many 
 if not most of the ufo literature available. 
i have read many case reports and 
sightings so i know what  could be 
easily described as a ufo when a logical 
explanation is available. 
  
  

heres my sighting, 
  

i was standing by my patio door having 
 a cigarette and my wife had just gone in 
 the bath, whilst smoking i noticed a black 
 object in the sky approx 3 miles away from 
 my home, at first it could be confused with 
 a hawk hovering at close range, but over 
a heavy populated area at approx 3 miles, 
 i think not. 
 i continued to watch the object as my mind 
 was trying to rationalise what i was seeing 
to an object i could relate to, i couldn't. 
the object was black, no lights no sound. 
it seemed to be oval shaped and on 
ocassions changed to a triangle shape. 
visibility was very good, clear sky with a few 
rain clouds to the horizon and a few brillant 
white clouds which were being illuminated 
by the sun. 
 i watched for an estimated 1 min 30 secs 
before accepting that this could be a ufo. 

i have a 9 month old daughter and when 
she was born we decided to purchase a 
digital hard drive camcorder to film her 
growing up. i decided to fetch this knowing 
 more than likely that when i return the 
object will have disapeared. 
i returned with the camera and noticed 
 the object was still there, only now it was 
on the move. 
i powered up my camera and started to 
film the object. the digital display on the 
camera is approx 3 inches in size so 
i couldn't tell if i had the object in view or 
even in focus, but i continued to film. 
the object moved over the trees and towards 
 the horizon and finally disapeared behind a cloud. 
my ideal reactions would have been to notify 
the local police of a potential unidentified 
object within a flight path and even contact 
air traffic control. 
reading as many ufo books 
 as i have i know how important recordable 
data is, but strange enough i did what most 
general public do, i thought how strange and 
just sat down going over in my mind what i 
had just witnessed. 
the only plausable thing 
 i did was to email timothy good straight away. 
although the obect was quite far away, with 
a trained eye i could just about identify its 
shapes. we decided to watch the video to 
see if you could see the little dot in the sky 
and to our amazment we captued 
2 mis 32 secs of the ordeal, and the footage 
 is very clear
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo over birmingham caught on camera

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen quite a few (more than usual) speedy little discs zipping around. they are too fast to be planes or satillites. no con trails. very shiny, and they also change direction fast, and sometimes just vanish. also, a few months before, i awoke with a start at about 10:30 pm, sweating like crazy. i felt more frightened than ever in my life. i am 100% sure didn't i didn't have a dream, but i feel that something bad happened to me or my mind... 


do not e-mail me, i do not wish to be interviewed.
content.summary: Series of sightings, duanesburg ny, in june-july '07 possible ubduction

content.detailedDescription: I was laying with my buddy in the grass watching planes fly by at night, and they were very slow and noisy. then we both noticed 7 dim red lights shaped like a > with 3 lights on each "wing" and one in the middle connecting them. it was out of sight within seconds and appeared much higher than the planes.  the object flew unbelievably fast and made absolutely no noise.  me and my friend were satisfied with our sight and went home. the end!
content.summary: 7 dim red lights triangle shape very fast silent

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my observatory with the intention of photographing a certain nebulocity.  instead, i found that "sky-glow" this night would only make photography an effort in futility.  i was staring at the eastern sky for a few minutes when, out of the corner of my eye, i spotted a very bright light shining behind a tree line in the distance.

since we live in the heart of farmland, i thought i might be looking at the light of farm equipment, until i realized that this light was far brighter than any farm equipment that i know of, plus the fact that this hour was not compatible with farmers.

the light was stationary for a short time, and then began moving very slowly in a northerly direction.  it appeared to be on the ground, and then it started to rise slowly, while moving forward.  this light appeared to be three-quarters to one mile away.  the light first appeared to me near the southeast corner, and was slowly moving toward the north.  i was awed by the brightness of this light.

within thirty to forty seconds, this light slowly rose above the tree line and began to turn in my direction.  at this time i could not distinguish any shape or design; just a powerful light that was illuminating the trees and turf as it approached.

my wife and i moved to this location in 2003.  i had had an observatory on our other property, which i disassembled and reassembled here.  we live sixteen miles from a nuclear power plant, and while building my observatory, i seemed to have sparked an interest from the military, because military helicopters circled and observed my project on two occasions.  therefore, i began to think that the military might have a renewed interest in what i was doing.  i decided that this object was probably a helicopter in search of something, or perhaps someone.  i was waiting for the sound of an engine and rotor blades, but there was none.  this object was moving in my direction, so low and so slowly that i was occasionally able to discern objects under its bright light.

my neighbor has a maintenance shop and warehouse on his property, directly in front of where i was standing.  as the object began to approach my neighbor's property, its light went out.  many seconds passed, and i thought the thing was gone.  then, suddenly, i was confronted with an enormous object clearly defined by ambient light just above the roof of the shop.  it was so low, moving so slowly, and heading straight for me; and i actually thought it was crashing.  as this thing began approaching me and my observatory, it began to rise a little.

i was so stunned by what i was seeing that i was preparing to run.  this thing was barely moving forward now, and could not be more than 200 feet above me, probably less.  i could make out incredible detail.  if there were rivets or bolts in its construction, i would have been able to count them.  as the object's rounded nose began to approach me, i was really taken back by its brightly lit windows.  there were none on or above its nose, but i was almost shocked to see a figure (humanoid form) moving as if it were pacing back and forth, in the large port window.  i could see no other shapes or shadows in any of the other windows.  of the many ridiculous thoughts that were dashing through my nind, one in particular was, "there's no one at the controls."  as this larger window got closer, the figure moved away from the window toward the center of the craft, and disappeared from sight.  i was actually startled by how slowly this thing was moving, because it appeared to be getting ready to hover as its open hatch moved directly over me.

i have to admit that i was entertaining some negative thoughts regarding my own safety at this time; but at the same time, i was so entranced by this object and this event, that i just kept staring.  details of this object are as follows:

(1) at least two stories high (that which i could see)
(2) two larger windows, port and starboard
(3) several smaller windows
(4) a rounded nose
(5) a shadowy figure in the large port side window
(6) three opaque light type structures (there were no active lights)
(7) two large turbo type structures (somewhat larger in diameter and shorter in length than what i am used to seeing on commercial aircraft)
(8) eight flap or stabilizer type structures aft
(9) a very large, square, black container type structure protruding off-center from its underbelly
(10) an open hatch

i know that there were other bulky geometric shapes that i saw on this object, but for some reason, i absolutely cannot remember what they looked like or where they were.  i remember thinking of this thing as being huge, thick and bulky, with an incredible amount of drag, and that it could not be an aerodynamic possibility.

almost immediately i felt a surge of static electricity.  the hair on my head and arms was moving, and i could feel a gentle tingle on my face.  i did not take my eyes off this object at any time.  as its tail section was about to pass over me, i quickly spun the dome.  as i was spinning the dome, while continuing to stare at this thing, it was gone.  no turbulence.  no sound.  just gone.  i continued to do a 360 degree search for a few minutes, but nothing was there.

i must add that when the object was passing directly over me, it was making a sound.  the sound was too faint to be heard in any enclosed structure such as a house, shed, car, etc.; but nevertheless, it was there.  the best way i can describe ths sound would be a low-pitched roar or drone, similar to what you might hear a mile or so away from an airport, when a jet lands silently and its reverse thrusters are activated.  also, this sound was superimposed with another faint sound, much like the sound of bacon sizzling in a frying pan.

when i spoke with a mufon representative over the phone, i mentioned that some of the equipment in my observatory had failed.  shortly after this event, i had major surgery, and it was about one and one-half months before i was able to re-enter my observatory.  what i discovered was that the micro-processor in the telescope itself appeared to be "fried," along with another piece of equipment.  i replaced the panel board in the telescope, and all is well.

i am well aware of what static electricity can do to a micro-processor.  is that what happened?  so much time had elapsed from the time of the event until i went back to my observatory that i feel it would not be accurate for me to say for sure that this is what happened...Just probably.

my wife and i did tour the area, as well as the surrounding areas to where i believed this event took place, and we found nothing out of the ordinary.
content.summary: While in my observatory, a very large, triangular-shaped object moved slowly toward me and passed directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir,madame,

i taught of sending you the following this afternoon about what i saw this
morning over the hamrun(city)in country(malta) sky and after i searched for a ufo agency website
to where i can send this info,besides mufor here in malta.

it was between 12:25-13:30 today afternoon wednesday 04,2007,i think when i was
driving my car to the way down to st.Gaetan church in st.Joseph street hamrun(city)
when i noticed a very small silver shining disc shaped flat object very very high
altitude almost over the coppola of st.Gaetan church.

the object was turning upside down in intervals and like in slow motion,floating kind of way and maybe in angles(left)at the same point as
well.I could see the below surface was more plain,flat when it angled in this position.
at times the object was getting smaller /fading and then appearing better
again.

i was of course getting more serious and excited for myself that after seeing that it was not an airplane,i was therefore witnessing a ufo.

i did not carry a camera but,i am sure it was not an airplaine.
i taught even to myself to evaluate other reasons, that it could be a ballon silver went loose,but i
do not think so as it was more like an object doing some sort of manouvers
as i explained above,almost the same..

i drived my car more ahead at blata l-bajda forward ahead the street to catch this view better but
i could not see it again.I went back to the original position where i was first and i did
not see it again.That was the end of it!


so,i taught i would inform you about this and maybe you want to check with
the radar stations at this hour and location if something appeared or not
on their machines.However i saw something this afternoon wich resembles as
a ufo.


thank you and i hope more info will come about this event...
content.summary: Silver disc shaped object flipping /floating upside down .Fading and reapperaing again at the same point.Maybe moved from when i drived ahead.But not in front of my eyes.I saw it at a different location.Same sky area.

content.detailedDescription: On 3-9-2005 at about 1:30 am i was watching tv in my home when i heard helicopters outside. i live close to wpafb so its not unusual to hear different aircrafts flying at all hours, but i could tell there was at least 2 & they sounded like they were hoovering. anyway, i went out my back door to see what i could see. when i walked out back i saw 2 helicopters hoovering close together just a short distance from my home, as i'm looking at them trying to figure out what they could be doing i happened to look straight up. to my astonishment there is a massive (probably 200 yards) triangular shaped object above my house. it was totaly silent. i stood there,not believing what i'm seeing. from what i could see the object appeared totally black with 3 white lights, 1 on each corner. after a few minutes i ran inside to get my camera to photo what i could. of course my battery was dead! i ran back inside to wake up my husband, but as i'm inside i hear the helicopters leaving. i went back outside & the helicopters & the object were gone. the object seemed to only be about 150 feet above my house, actually it was above numerous houses, i live in a subdivision. sure would like to know what they were doing over my house, creepy!
content.summary: Triangle shape object hovering over house

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had just come from te romas,we had just finished dinner and i began driving down kaltz toward our home. before reaching the stop sign i noticed in the sky a red glow thinking it was a firework, and i told my husband, who was next to me in the car, to look at it because it wasn't reacting like a firework that disappears after it burns out.  i pulled up to the stop sign and got out as i did i called 911 and reported that the ball of fire was headed north toward van dyke the whole event lasted about 45 to 50 seconds.  the 911 operator asked my location and discription of the object and i explained to her what i was viewing.  another couple, who had pulled up to go around us, had stopped as i pointed to the sky, and they also saw the object.  the 911 operator asked me how big and how far away the object was and i told her it looked about the size of a small aircraft, though not an aircraft and was at a low altitude and just floated over me as i was speaking.  she said she would dispatch some one and i told her all they have to do is look up in the sky and they would see it.  i ended the call to 911 with the feeling that nothing was going to be done and that my call would be filed away as a prank.  i got back in my vehicle and proceeded to go toward van dyke but the object had disappeared.  i watch the sky all the time and i know an aircraft or a star or a fire work when i see one, and believe me , this was no fire work.   i hope someone else besides the couple who was in the other vehicle, my husband and myself saw what we did las night.  it was really spectacular.  it floated, no sound, just floated across the sky and right over our vehicles it was like a red fireball, it moved slowly and it was very low altitude.  
thank you for your time, i didn't know where else to put this report but here.
content.summary: Thought it was a firework but it didnt  die out it floated across the sky at low altitiude and i called 911

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the porch to get photos of anything in the sky and then noticed an airplane flying over so i tried to zoom in and get a shot.  i then took several shots of the sky around it hoping to get something on film/digital camera.  i have been getting these for 4 weeks in a row at different times and locations in my community.  many are orbs , but several photos of crafts including one on video are disk shaped.
content.summary: Photo taken from my front porch

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i have been rather weary on speaking about this subject for obvious reasons but seeing is beliving and i was ounce a non believer but now i know the truth. this is what happend the first time i seen this.
i was on my back porch late one night smokin a cigarete,i often gaze at the beauty of the stars,but this paticular time was like no usual gazing. i looked up an was astonished at what i was seeing a fear like no other had befallen me. i said no no no noway,i went inside walked back out 3 times saw the same thing in the same place doing the same thing. zig zaging all over the place. i am convinced that no man made object can move so fast like this was doing, and if such a thing does exist than only few know of it. since then i have been constantly seeing the same shit almost every night since then the date being now july 2 07. ive been seeing this id say for the past 4 months roughly speaking. my redkneck butt wants to know what the hell is going and why does this bs goverment doing every thing in its power to hide  this from the public. i mean ive been through some shit in my life but damn this takes the whole cake.
content.summary: Ufo sightin

content.detailedDescription:
I am relaying this story on behalf of my father, who swore my mother and i to secrecy when it first happened because he was very scared by his experience and didn't want to be ridiculed if details ended up in the public domain.  over a year later, he's finally agreed to let me share details of this incident with mufon because i've convinced him it should be recorded *someplace* publicly, even if he doesn't want to go public himself.

on may 1st 2006 my father had to drive from chester, england to porthmadog, north wales, for work reasons.  at approx 4:45pm on the return journey, he was driving south, approaching the village of gellilydan when he became aware of a "silhouetted cigar shaped object" flying 'gently' below cloud level in an easterly direction about two miles ahead of him.  he lost sight of it a few times due to the landscape, but having passed by the village, it became apparent that it was flying slowly north (towards him). assuming it was a 'regular aircraft' that he couldn't quite visualize properly, he was more interested than concerned at this point, and due to its apparent flight path over the open countryside, he figured it would clear him by less than a mile to the west when it passed.  so, his interest was piqued ("is it a helicopter or a plane?" he wondered) and he reduced his driving speed to approx 20-30mph in order to get a better view.

as the flying object approached a point about 3/4 mile south west of his vehicle, he realised it was actually 'cylindrical'.  it had a reflective convex base and a very subtle (barely noticeable) "electric blue" aura.  he could only really see the underneath due to its angle.  this took him back ("my heart rate accelerated") and having a camera on him, decided to pull over onto a grass verge and take a photo. as he did this and scrambled for the camera, he realised the object had accelerated in his direction (it was very high up) and a huge shadow enveloped the area for about a mile around.  "it was like a very dark thundercloud was right over me."  he pushed his head forward in the windscreen and looked up (awkward angle) - and to his horror could see that this thing was about 1/4 mile wide and just hovering beneath cloud level directly above the part of the road he was on.  he said it had huge tiles on its convex base.  he had never seen anything like it in his life.  it was "impossibly enormous".  he realises -- due to the sheer size of this thing -- that he probably underestimated how far away it was previously, but in relaying this event we've decided to use distances as he "perceived them" at the time.

anyway, his heart was pounding, he was truly terrified because he couldn't make sense of the object and he was in the middle of nowhere (snowdonia national park) and decided to get the hell out of there.  he hastily started up his vehicle and pulled off when he noticed the shadow just disappear, "like somebody flicked a switch and the thundercloud vanished".  he looked around as he drove, pushed his face into the windscreen and looked up but he could no longer see it.  then (within sixty seconds), as he passed the trawsfynydd twin nuclear reactors, he became aware of it hovering above some high ground to the west.  the camera was on the passenger seat so without stopping the vehicle he just instinctively picked it up, snapped, then accelerated to 70mph intending to get out of the area as fast as possible.  he was overjoyed when he realised this 'object' had appeared on the exposure because it proved he wasn't going mad and he *had* actually witnessed something very unusual.  if it hadn't, he says he's not sure he'd have told my mother and i the story in case we thought he was cracking up.

ever since, he has been scared of driving through rural areas alone, and won't drive at night time at all.  (not that it was night time when this incident occurred.)  i can understand that.  it's a good job he had to retire last summer really because he'd no longer be able to do his job due to the amount of driving involved.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Peculiar flying object by trawsfynydd nuclear power station

content.detailedDescription:
The first ufo was seen at 2:07 am by my friend through his hardin dobsonian 8inch telescope at 150x magnification. he had yelled out and it could be seen with the naked eye and had the brightness of vega. he and i both tracked it with the telescope and with our eyes. it was travelling from south to north at a fairly good speed and it seemed to have reflected the sun (whitish yellow light as it flew over). as it went more north, the ufo reflected or gave off less light and eventually disappeared/dimmed out. through the telescope my friend said it looked to be round and white to where i thought it looked more wedge/half moon shaped and white. when it disappeared from view it was 2:09am. my friend is an amatuer astronomer and we did look online at "heavens-above" and a couple of other websites to see if anything matched what we saw. we couldn't find any matches. the object was not a meteor or meterorite, it was artificial given its appeareance and trajectory. it seemed to have kept a straight line and did nothing unusual other than get dimmer as it moved north. it seems to have kept the same altitude the whole time it flew over.

at 2:20am, again with the same telescope, we spotted a white dot/orb that was moving from south to east in the field of view through the telescope. it was travelling too slow to be a meteor or meteorite. my friend said that they (all the amatuer astronomers) often see these in his astronomy club and refer to them as "satellites." i saw a similar object travelling the same direction 6 minutes later. it might have been the same object or a different one. neither of these objects could be seen with the naked eye, and the magnification was the same as stated above.

1. we were star gazing through my friends telescope.

2. he noticed object one and two through his telescope. object three i noticed through his telescope.

3. some kind of object in orbit. my friend said the space station which we found out would not be visible through the naked eye. the other two objects i took to his word that they were satellites.

4. described above.
5. it was exciting, not knowing what they were. especially the first object.
6. the first one faded going north. the other two objects were hard to track through the telescope.
content.summary: Three separate ufos were seen twenty minutes apart

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 5 to 6 pm local time i was standing on a balcony near the main railroad station, looking south. the sky was 7/8 to overcast with a lower cloud ceiling of - hard to say 300 to 500 meter ? - there was no rain. 
it was an unusual light environment, which i would explain as to be the clouds to be very slim or so. it wasn't dark, more some sort of yellowish twilight short before a thunderstorm. actually i don't remember wether it rained later that day or not, but i think it didn't.

from the balcony you have free 270��� view over the city towards the harz-mountains south of braunschweig.
visibility below the clouds was good, so far.
i don't know how long there was this orange light in position observed in about 45��� or higher (elevation) directly in the south of my position, but it catched my attention when it started moving southeast.
my first idea was that there might be a helicopter or a low flying plane in the clouds, but there was no typical sound.
it appears to be something hidden in the lower layers of the clouds, and i saw it first accelerating at moderate speed heading approx. 135���.
it continues to accelerate faster and rapidly changed course to approx. 225��� and seconds later again to approx 190���, while my direction of view was straight 180��� south.
the acceleration between first and second course change was fast, and so it remains a mystery to me how something manmade could have performed a sharp turn at that speed without disintegration. 
between first course change and second its flightpath covered the length of my underarm including hands if holded up into view.
on its second turn it stirred up the underside of the clouds or peaked out of them and a darkish structure or fuselage became visible for fractions of a second. while it was partly visible it appeared like 'burning'. but not 'burning' in common sense, i would say burning from color composition and from some glowing above the visible part of the structure reflecting on the clouds it passed through.
the structure came out a few times on its southbound course but just for fractions of a second, not long enough to be completly visible or to tell its shape.
while i observed it i yelled into the apartment to make a friend of mine to come out to see it, but he was busy, or didn't hear me. however when that thingy sped off southbound i ran inside and got my friend out. 
when we returned on the balcony it was gone and he didn't see it.

i must say, i regulary stand there and enjoy the good sight over the southern part of the city. i often see planes or helicopters flying at that altitudes, therefor i think i can say that it wasn't a helicopter or plane, cause of the silence during observation, and for its speed and capabilities to change course in such a manner.
from its looks i would conclude on observing a meteorite, but those tend to fall in a straight line, and also do not perform multiple changes in course like that, or accelerate like that.
the object remained in one piece, there was no additional smoke, and it wasn't a light reflection of some sort as far as i can say - i observed it without looking through a window. 
i can rule out the possibility that it might was a strong light on the underside of the clouds, cause i clearly saw this darkish structure, and it wasn't dark during observation. 


i put this on file cause maybe someone saw it too
possibly south of braunschweig, wolfenbuettel area, salzgitter area, harz mountains.
content.summary: Orange glowing/burnig  fast accelerating into harz mountains, rapid turns

content.detailedDescription:
It was summer of 1980 or 1981 around 11:00 p.M., when i went outside for a minute. i looked up and was shocked to see a huge disc above my house. it had lights around the edges and was completely silent. it hovered for a short time and then swooped off so fast you could hardly see it go. i jumped in the car to go to the top of the hill only a few hundred yards away, but by then i couldn't tell it from a star.

the waterbury republican/american ran a small column on the front page about the 800 or so calls they had received about a ufo. it had visited a nearby drive-in movie theater, [where my brother happened to be at the time]. the next day, it was dismissed as an "advertising balloon" from bob's surplus store.  (what a joke!)
content.summary: Gigantic disc hovering over my house, lights around the rim, sped off unbelievably fast

content.detailedDescription: The date is approximate,this happened right outside my house. i've kind of been in denial about this since i saw it, due to the fact that it had no explanation. that is why i have not come forward until now.  two other people also witnessed this with me. we had stepped outside for a cigarette around 11pm. when i looked up and noticed the sky was completely blotted out. as the object passed over us we could see it was triangle shaped. this thing was huge. it seemed to be only 100 feet in the air, moved silently but steadily northward until it was out of our sight,we also noticed it had lights at each corner. i recently became interested when a person described this very same object on a program i happened to be watching. does anyone have any idea what that thing was? if it was military,why haven't we seen it? there certainly would be a use for such technology by now, obviously 9 years ago when i saw this thing it was already perfected.
content.summary: Slow moving,silent,dark triangle passed over my house, from south to north, it was massive and had lights at the corners.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a bright red continous large light coming from the eastside of indianapolis and proceeded to the southwest side. object was below cloud coverage when first noticed and then changed from red to orange once object moved through cloud coverage. upon going throught cloud coverage the object started to fade out of sight. no blinking lights were observed coming from the object and approximate speed of an airplane. nine other witnesses observed the same light.
content.summary: Bright red light over indianapolis

content.detailedDescription: I live on top of nob hill, see from angel island to south san fran., early fri morning, i saw 2 orange lights due south. the lights were one object, were hovering, and though far away was silent. i had some drinks but saw these lights. i ran and got my camera took a shot - nothing, but kept watching. it seemed then to do a 180, saw a white light in the rear and it disappeared. the sky was clear, little fog. i looked around in the area and saw nothing, it was gone. my my view is was to the left of sutro tower. i thought it may be a plane, but no other traffic and it was too late to fly. i get a lot of copters, but news and again it was silent and too late/early in am. i have always believed, never saw anything like this, except when i was a kid at my house near muir woods - different type of sighting (haunting and still troublesome)and too much to type. if anyone saw something that early morn., please post. thanks
content.summary: 2 orange lights then a whitish light when reversed

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i was driving down the road. i noticed a ball of fire in the sky. i thought it was a firework, but it wasn't it didn't go out. it was an overcast night, so there was just a wall of clouds. it was heading north on the east side of indianapolis, then it changed and went west. we watched it for 4 mins. it started to go up, and then disappeared into the clouds. it was going about as fast as a airplane.
content.summary: Burning ball in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: All it does is just site ther and sometimes blink and looks something like a star but it is realy not a star at first i thought it was the north star but as i lookedat it threw some binoculars i saw ttwo lights on the the thing and i see some rain bow like colors on the thing like red,blue,gren lighs i see this thing in the sky every clear stary night. one time me and my dad and my girl friend was at a baseball game and we seen the same object and my dad thought it was a plain he said it ws getting closer but the object seem to be in the same spott and me and my girl now know that is not a plain nor a star we think it is something else like a ufo or something.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: It be out there every night on a clear stary night

content.detailedDescription:
I was boating with 4 friends and taking pictures of the sunset and the nearly full moon about 30 to 45 min. after sunset.  i took about 10 sunset photos and 5 of the moon.  i looked at my photos today and noticed 2 large strange illuminated diamond shaped objects appear in one of them.  at the time i took the photo i saw nothing, neither did anyone else.  it's probably just a strange camera effect, but nonetheless interesting.  if it is some camera effect/error, no wonder we have so many ufolike photos around!  

after zooming in on them on my computer i also noticed a small white and silver sphere object as well.  the diamond shapes seem very similar to other ufo pictures i've seen and both objects appear similar, but one is at a different angle.  after another inspection it also seems there is grey exhaust type trail behind each of the large objects, but they appear to be heading in different directions.  the small round one reminds me of the swarm of ufo's captured in mexico by a news crew, but more likely it is venus or another star...This object appears in another photo in the same location and looks boomerange shaped, but the photo is blurred from being on a rocking boat and i now believe it to be a star.  the small one is directly in a line between the uppermost right large object and the moon.  there are also two large circles of different shading, one very big below the object and a smaller one just to the right of the moon.  i suppose this could all be some weird camera effect, but it doesn't appear in any other photos and i've shot over 1,000 photo with this camera and never had anything like this appear.  there are a few dropped pixels in the picture as well.  i have made no alterations to the files, they are directly off the camera.  the camera is an 8 megapixel olympus sp 350 and the file size of the image is 1.5 megabytes with pretty good resolution.  the first photo may have been with the flash on, and the second two i think i turned it to off from auto.  perhaps they are insects illuminated by the flash??  any photo anylysis or possible explanations would be appreciated.  i'm including 2 of the other moon shots where nothing appears for comparison...(except the small object i believe is a star).  the camera records all 3 photos as taken during the same minute...9:10pm
content.summary: Ufo not seen by anyone - only appeared in digital photo

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bathroom and saw a bright light outdoors and it was coming from the sky and i look up and it was a odd shaped thing that had every possible color ive ever seen, then the light whent off and it was hovering low to the ground and suddenly it sped off faster than anything i ever saw.
content.summary: Stayed low to ground and suddenly sped off

content.detailedDescription:
My nephew and i were cruising down, i believe 441 (i'm new in the area) going north when we saw odd-shaped lights up ahead in the distance. they were odd-looking enough to get joking comments from me about it being a ufo. as we got closed, we realized it was moving very slowly, practically hovering.. as we got even closer, it changed directions from traveling south west eventually east. as it got closer and closer, we were very surprised to see how slowly it was moving. it seemed like maybe 40-50 miles per hour. the "wings" were large - the size of 3 or 4 passenger plane wings. there were lights beneath these wings. as it traveled east directly above us, i opened my window to get a better look. i didn't hear anything. it was a few hundred feet above us. we should have heard something. i got the best look at it through my moonroof. it looked exactly like this:

http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/newstagvee.Jpg

if i would have drawn a picture of it, it would have come out a lot like that picture. it was absolutely not a plane (it had no body) or a helicopter. it was traveling extremely slow and silently. i have no idea why i didn't try to follow this thing and take pictures with my camera phone. they probably wouldn't have come out but i really don't know why i didn't decide to follow it more. i suppose i didn't really believe that i saw what i saw when i was seeing it... i could have turned right and followed it a little longer, but i didn't. we're both shocked that we didn't look further into whatever this was...

p.S. it was flying beneath the clouds. the clouds were greyish white - making it very easy to see this object...
content.summary: Saw slow-moving boomerang shaped ufo in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting #1: 10:00 pm or slightly before. my brother frank, age 45, and daughter maria, age 30, and myself were sitting out in our back yard patio around a table talking when my brother jumped up and said "what the heck is that!", looking up at the sky towards the north from our home in independence, mo.  my daughter and i then jumped up to look and we saw a very large, very bright white circular object traveling from west to east.  this was two-three times the brightness of venus, and the size of approximately 4 747's, or three-four times the size of venus.  there was a smaller, less bright object following approximately 500 ft behind and slightly left of the larger object that did not change position. i guessed them to be at about 1000 ft.  we noticed a jet airliner way above these objects.  the ufo's were moving at a fairly fast clip - and we ran across the driveway into the street (about 100 ft) to catch sight of the objects through the trees but lost them.  the sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds or slightly more.  i found out the next day that the iss was traveling in the same area at nearly the same time, however, these objects were way too low and too bright to have been the iss and shuttle. 
 
now for the really strange part: a couple of minutes before this happened my husband told us he was going to the warehouse to check on something. i thought it was odd because it was so late, but i thought he would be right back.  i was mad that he missed this sighting by two minutes -he always seems to miss stuff like this.  now when we ran through the driveway i saw his work van there and so thought he had not left yet.  after we lost sight of the objects, the three of us moved out of the street into the driveway and were talking about what the objects could have been, when i noticed that my husband walked from the driveway up the porch steps to the side of the house. it was dark outside, but not pitch dark-- and light was coming out of the sliding doors on the porch so the area had some illumination, but what i could see was as a black outline of a person and he was walking strangely.  then i noticed that my car was missing. i said "wait a minute, where is gene?" to my brother and daughter. they said "he must have left in your car."  at that point, i got a very creepy scary feeling and actually started to shake.  now i don't scare too easly, but this was different.  as i thought about it i realized that whatever it was had long arms down to the knees and swung his arms in an odd manner, more like what an ape would do, and i realized at that point that it could not have been my husband that i saw! 
 
the three of us collected ourselves after a couple of minutes and decided to go inside to look in every room in the house but nothing was there.  i realized that it was probably not a human being, and chills ran up my spine. 
 
my brother needed to go home, and since he had been dropped off after a training meeting at the police department where he is a volunteer, he needed a ride.  my daughter took him home and i went along because i did not want to be alone in the house.  after dropping my brother off we stopped at my daughter's house to see the work that her husband had finished building a fountain and patio, and i stayed for a while talking with them because i was too afraid to go home yet,  then she took me home at about 11:25 p.M. mh husband was not home yet, so i got a big kitchen knife and turned on all of the lights outside the house and on the lower level, locked the doors, then went to the living room to read and wait for him to get back. i did not turn on the t.V. so i would be able to hear any noises. 
 
sighting #2: 11:39 p.M. maria had to drop of some important mail at the post ooffice in downtown independence, and when she came out of the doors something caught her eye over a building on the square that was 1/2 block from the post office in a northerly direction.  she said it looked like something the size of a streetlight, a very bright white light, and fell-- free-fall-- from a height of about 60 ft above the building.  there was no trail of light behind it.  she thought it must have fallen into or just behind the building and was going to go check on it, when she saw a silver truck parked at the side of the building with someone sitting in it. for some reason, she thought that was odd at that hour and decided not to pursue finding the object. note: the building she saw this thing over happens to be right across the street from our two businesses. 
 
maria called me and told me about this. we were both incredulous that a second sighting could happen to her on the same night.  i told her i was a little concerned that my husband had not yet returned, and it was getting late.  a few minutes after we hung up he arrived.  when asked why he decided to go to the warehouse so late, and he said he needed to move some stuff around for new stock coming in.  i still thought it was strange, though. i told him what had happened and he was amazed and mad that he didn't see it. i was so stressed out that my neck hurt and i told him i wanted to get in the hot tub on the porch but i wanted him to stay downstairs so i wouldn't be alone.  he went in the living room and fell asleep on the couch while i got in the tub. i did not feel a presence of anything around, but was still keeping an eye out. maria had suggested that i meditate and and ask what was going on with all of the (extremely) strange stuff that night.  i did so, and to my surprise i heard four strange voices talking - it was conversation from an air base and i wrote the entire conversation down right after hearing it!  basically, it was about a bogey appearing on radar and they sent a jet up to chase it. note: i am not adding that down here but if anyone is interested i can send it. i don't know what all of the jargon means - i don't have any experience with planes, but i got the impression that this was a real ufo event. 
 
sighting #3: now i came out of it and did not hear anything other conversation going on although i felt that was not the end of it. i got out of the hot tub, looked skyward, and saw a bright whitish/yellow object the size and brightness of mars go from eastto west.  it had a trail like a shooting star, however, at this point i wonder what it really was!
content.summary: Three spectacular ufo sightings and possible alien june 20 near k.C.

content.detailedDescription:
February 1976.
 i was outside making snowmen in my parents backyard,as a kid i was 11 years old. it was a bright sunny day with little cloudcover and cold. i had a great view of the landscape as many farms surrounded our place in the country. 
 something caught my eye to the south and i looked up to see a rectangular object travelling slowly from my left to right. it was a thin object with no portholes and seemed metallic looking. i could see it clearly (it was around 11 am) and had a checker board pattern on the bottom red and silver/metallic. it appeared slightly longer than it was wide. 
 i watched in amazment for a few seconds, i would estimate its altitude to be around 500 feet high flying level to the ground. at its closest approach it looked to be within 1000 feet of me but it did not slow down as it passed me. i had no idea what the object was as it did not resemble any of the aircraft i had observed which occasionally fly by (at higher altitudes) to halifax airport. also the airport lies west of my location and it was flying north. this object was not aerodynamic; it had square edges! i have attended many airshows (us and canadian) since and nothing resembles it! 
 the object,which was solid as i could not see through it, continued for a few more seconds and then blindingly accelerated off continuing its trajectory that i had first seen it on. it looked like it did not climb but maintained altitude, possibly disappearing over the horizon several miles to the north. it was difficult to tell exactly where it went due to its amazing acceleration/speed, it took maybe half asecond to go several miles, 
(it had been travelling approx 60 mph before this) it did not make any sound. no exhaust was seen either. no sonic boom. it was then and is now a complete mystery. i never saw it again even though i still visit that spot frequently,30 years later. 
 unfortunately i believe i was the only witness to the event, the rest of my family was in the house, and it is a lowly populated area. i remember telling my dad who was asleep on the couch but he really wasn't open/ interested in these kinds of things and besides it was already gone.
 soon after the event (and not before) i became keenly interested in the subject of ufo's, reading any and all books on the subject. began watching tv shows on the subject and still do to this day. its still a mystery. i believe there are unknown , intelligently controlled objects out there. the government would be 'foolish' to ignore them. i believe they do not, no matter what the press releases say!
 as a final note i went into engineering after high school possibly due to the feeling that was left with me. i just had to know how things 'worked'.
content.summary: A metallic rectangular ufo passed overhead at close range and then spedoff at impossible speed, making no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday june 23, aprox. 11:30 am three sets of two usa fighter jets flew over our camp ground area and seemed to be flying very low.  didn't think that was normal?

within 15 min later i was near the open water setting up my beach chair and this object caught my eye.  i then grabbed my camera and two pictures.

i have had the film developed and have proof of this event.

the loction of event was on the hudson river, nine miles north of lake lucerne.

if you orgazation is enterested in my photos, feel free to call me at home. 518-731-7580
content.summary: Long, narrow black in color

content.detailedDescription: The incident was pretty much instant, i took a picture of a lovely sunset while on holiday in cuba. immediately on taking the picture i noticed on the view screen an object which i had not seen in the sky. i looked up and still there was nothing there. i took a few more pictures of the same area but nothing else appeared on the screen. i dont know what is on the picture but im sure you'll admit there is definately something wierd there
content.summary: Object seen in a photo taken with a digital camera

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking along a road that paralelled the west side of north manistique lake. we had walked a half mile (south) past a large curve in the road that bends to the west and then south. on our nightly walks it was not unusual to see headlights from the cars coming around the curve. we saw lights coming and based upon the distance (1/2 mile) i knew i had about 20 seconds to get off the blacktop and walk on the shoulder. as i looked back to approximate the rate of closure the lights accelerated and a blinding flash went off over our heads. i winced in the expectation of a thunder clap (or something)for about a second, then looked up to see any sign of an air vehicle passsing over. there was no sound produced during the flash and i saw nothing in the sky. it was a perfectly clear (starlit) night and snow was covering the ground. the flash reminded me of the old poloroid camera bulbs back in the 60s. after searching the skies for a few seconds i checked my wrist watch to see if a time lapse had ocurred. it had not. my wife's instinct was to go back to our cottage and check on the safety of our children. i did not want to go back, so we continued on for a mile and then returned on the same route. whatever it was, it appeared to be following the road around the curve and then passed over us. 

i was a former military helicopter pilot for many years. the acceleration of the ufo, along with the absence of any noise, struck me as very odd. i would like to know if this type of sighting is common.
content.summary: Blinding flash overhead, with no sound or visual after the flash

content.detailedDescription: My uncle did not want me to reveal this. this event happened two years ago. on october 11th, 2007 i recieved a phone call from my uncle. my uncle lives in a rural area. he stated that the night before, he was painting his bed room and super bright lights filled his house. he thought that someone was shining bright car headlights into his house. he went outside to see what was going on and a bright light just disappeared. he showed me where the object was. i noticed that there were four circles 'burned into grass". the circles were aranged in a diamond shape. the two large circles(18 inches in diameter) were opposite each other with a distance of six feet. the smaller circles (8 inches in diameter) were opposite each other on the other apexes of the triangle. my uncle stated that the lights were a frequent visitor. he begged me not to tell anyone fearing that they would believe he was crazy. i was moving items and found my pictures and decided to post them.
content.summary: Uncle called that something happened, showed burn marks in grass
